summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Market Street from 24th Avenue Northwest to a point 88.43 feet east of the east margin of 30th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8376 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
